title: Ticket #1547: Add reporting functionality of condor_hdfs
description: Previous implementation of condor_hdfs did not have reporting functionality. Therefore, condor_collector is not informed about details of HDFS cluster.
remarks:
Following details added as in report:

ServiceType: HADOOP_NAMENODE/HADOOP_DATANODE/HADOOP_SECONDARY
Safemode: ON/OFF
Configured Capacity:
Present Capacity:
DFS Remaining:
DFS Used:
DFS Used%:
Under replicated blocks:
Blocks with corrupt replicas:
Missing blocks:
Datanodes available:

Also other administrative commands can be run bu using runDFSAdmin( cmd)
for example: 

 runDFSAdmin("-safemode get")
